channel.title: Comments on: Kajak polo (aka Canoe Polo)
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Mindy
item.dc:creator: Mindy
item.description: <p>It can be difficult coming back from injury. I had to do swimming for ages after having a broken leg. At least you've found something more interesting! I also found a good sports masseuse which helped with the pain and niggles. Good luck with getting back on court.</p>
item.content:encoded: It can be difficult coming back from injury. I had to do swimming for ages after having a broken leg. At least you’ve found something more interesting! I also found a good sports masseuse which helped with the pain and niggles. Good luck with getting back on court.
